resources.string: The WebView implementation used by your device is outdated.\nPlease update it to a compatible version.
WebViews are not supported by this device.\nInstall a compatible WebView implementation or switch to a supported device.
Please reopen the app after changes are made
Connection cannot be established.\nPlease check the hostname and your network connection.

plurals.name: connection_error_prefix
plurals.item: Tried %d candidate for input, without success.
Tried %d candidates for input, without success.

resources.string: To detect when wireless headphones or speakers are disconnected, the app requires Bluetooth access. On Android, this permission is described as access to nearby devices, and warns that Bluetooth devices can be used to infer the current location. However, the Jellyfin app will never use this permission to detect your location.
Please disable battery optimisations for media playback while the screen is off.
Do you want to allow the download to run over mobile data or roaming networks? Charges from your provider may apply. You can change this option later from settings.
Media will be downloaded over WiFi only.
Media will be downloaded over WiFi and mobile networks.
Media will be downloaded over WiFi, mobile and roaming networks.
Cannot download files without storage permissions
